name: Potent Poison
description:
Choose your poison and fight against other poison wielding killers to prove that yours is the most potent!

Controls: 

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Left Click: Basic Attack

Right Click: Special Move

During Versus mode player 2 will need to use a controller with the controls:

Left Stick: Move

Right Stick: Look

Right Trigger: Basic Attack

Left Trigger: Special Move

This project uses music by Kevin MacLeod and some code from A* pathfinding project. All other assets were created by me for this jam.

A* pathfinding project:
Link: https://arongranberg.com/astar/
